name: The Imaginary: COVID-19
description:
Visual novels for Final coursework, Applicative Illustrations of the Visual Communication Design major. This visual novel is used for individual assessment so there is a very short time limit. 

The COVID-19 pandemic is changing the world and affecting all aspects of life. This affected me who was in a bad condition and situation. All of that affects until something happens beyond common sense. This visual novel tells the story of me struggling in the early COVID-19 pandemic.

The visual novel is in the daily Bahasa Indonesia language.
